name: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
desc: Constants that control the presentation of the app, typically for fullscreen apps such as games or kiosks.

items.name: static var autoHideDock: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The dock is normally hidden, but automatically appears when moused near.

items.name: static var hideDock: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The dock is entirely hidden and disabled.

items.name: static var autoHideMenuBar: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The menu bar is normally hidden, but automatically appears when moused near.

items.name: static var hideMenuBar: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The menu bar is entirely hidden and disabled.

items.name: static var disableAppleMenu: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: All Apple Menu items are disabled.

items.name: static var disableProcessSwitching: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The process switching user interface (Command + Tab to cycle through apps) is disabled.

items.name: static var disableForceQuit: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The force quit panel (displayed by pressing Command + Option + Esc) is disabled

items.name: static var disableSessionTermination: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The panel that shows the Restart, Shut Down, and Log Out options that are displayed as a result of pushing the power key is disabled.

items.name: static var disableHideApplication: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The app’s “Hide” menu item is disabled.

items.name: static var disableMenuBarTransparency: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The menu bar transparency appearance is disabled.

items.name: static var fullScreen: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The app is in fullscreen mode.

items.name: static var autoHideToolbar: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: When in fullscreen mode the window toolbar is detached from window and hides and shows with autoHidden menuBar.

items.name: static var disableCursorLocationAssistance: NSApplication.PresentationOptions
items.desc: The behavior that allows the user to shake the mouse to locate the cursor is disabled.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a new presentation options structure.
